billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

title: Allows a retiree to file a request for Tier I status
summary: Allows Marion Hoffman to file a request for Tier I status in the New York State and Local Police and Fire Retirement System with the state comptroller.
actClause: AN ACT in relation to allowing Marion Hoffman to file a request for Tier I status in the New York state and local police and fire retirement system with the state comptroller
